short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record and visualize job application details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record a job application by selecting the extension [J] while on the job description page. Review and change details then confirm the job posting description details.

View your dashboard of job applications. Edit the info, add notes on the job application, and change details.

Websites supported:
- indeed
- linkedin
- monster
- glassdoor
- lever
- greenhouse
- workday

Any other websites can have their details manually fixed to have the proper information.
